website_summaries.verdict: Classic cork platform sandal that can dress up or down.
pros: With a heel of 2.95 inches on a 1.25-inch platform, this gives height while keeping the foot at a comfortable angle
This sandal stands out for its super soft leather and cushioned footbed
cons: Some users found their foot slipped out to the side

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and these shoes are extremely comfortable. I recommend sizing up half a size. They run a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Bell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: If you'd like to add 3 inches to your height without the dangers of toppling over, you've got to try these platform sandals! PROS: 1) They're absurdly comfortable: Soft, lightweight, and breathable. I've walked miles in these. 2) They're flattering: The open strap design visually elongates the length of the leg. 3) Options: Lots of colors to choose from, and you will! I've got three and counting. CONS: 1) None. But if you're looking for black-tie, this ain't it. The cork gives it a casual look, but you already knew that.
customer_reviews.author: CC Mac

customer_reviews.title: The leather is super soft.
customer_reviews.text: Just enough heel to make it look dressy. But I can still work all day. The leather is super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were extremely narrow! I have owned and loved many Clark's sandals, but I could barely get my foot inside this sandal. I'm not sure if the gold leather was just less forgiving than the other leathers, or if it is a constant no matter the leather you pick for this shoe. I've owned other Clark's sandals with metallic leather and not encountered this issue. Other than the extreme narrowness, these did seem very high quality like most Clark's.
customer_reviews.author: MD2KNF

customer_reviews.title: Soooo comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. I was hesitated buying clarks because some of them can look a bit like an older lady style & I'm in my early 30's.. I have a disc issue and my mom has always raved about clarks being comfortable so I decided to try these out since I needed a pair of wedges. They are super cute and beyond comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: yogagirl13

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These fit great, as I find I'm the same size in all Clarks shoes. I was worried that the crossed straps might dig into the top of my foot, but they are smooth and lined with soft fabric on the inside. No rubbing and the adjustable back strap ensures that the fit is snug enough not to shift around. The arch support is nice and high. The wedge gives a fair amount of stability to the shoe without looking clunky.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend these - not the quality I've come to expect from Clarks.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit as expected and are very comfortable. HOWEVER, after several wears, the upper is separating from the sole, and almost immediately there were wrinkles in the cork and the cork stains easily as well. I have not been wearing these through the dirt and the mud but just from everyday wear they have black smudges on the cork. So disappointed in these shoes - they were way too expensive and now I have to throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: C. Leininger

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: This is shoe well cushioned and the wedge gives you some height without pitch, which can crush the ball of your foot. Unfortunately, something in the design has me walking off the side of the shoe, if that makes sense. My foot keeps drifting to the inside and I have to stop and readjust my foot placement on the bed. My friend has the same pair in Black and has the same problem. Too bad, these could be an awesome shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable and lightweight. Walking around my apartment, the straps held on to my foot and I couldn't feel any spots that might lead to a blister. No rubbing. However, when the shoe arrived, the first thing I noticed was a stain on one of the straps. It is such a comfortable shoe that I will exchange it for a (hopefully) non-defective one. Little disappointed that something with such an obvious defect was shipped to me, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Comfortable, and Completely Versitile
customer_reviews.text: I needed a navy wedge and decided on these. I prefer the heal to be a little higher (but that is just me). I have worn them for two days and have received a MULTITUDE of compliments. One person literally tried them on and bought a pair in front of me. The foot bed is a cushion which is an added benefit. I have a slender foot (just barely a B) and typically wear between an 8-8.5. Bought 8.5 and am glad; I wouldn't be able to wear an 8. I have a 4 star only because I prefer a higher heal.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Me start by saying I have horrible arthritic feet, I usually have to buy very ugly shoes. I decided to try these because I have a job interview coming up. Hands-down the most comfortable girlie shoe I've ever worn! I wore them to work, I'm on my feet 8-9 hours at a time and they were great! No pain, no blisters, and this the morning after, no soreness! Don't doubt just buy them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: laura sue androy

customer_reviews.title: beware
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Clarks in the past; however, these fit great and were super comfortable, but here it is ....just a few months later and they are coming apart. I wear them about once a week at work. The glue has separated and the straps are coming lose. I can have the shoes repaired, but for the price, I would have expected them to last longer than one summer. I am very disappointed, will probably not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Reyannan

customer_reviews.title: Are these real Clarks?
customer_reviews.text: I see now that I'm not the only one who suspects there are fake Clarks floating around. I was so disappointed to receive feather light, flimsy shoes that look like they could fall apart at any moment. They fit so strangely. The arch support is nil--and too far back on the foot bed. The worst part (and glaring red flag) is that the soles of the shoes had some kind of oily residue on them that tracked all over my wood floors during the 30 seconds I had tried them on. Something is amiss with these shoes. What happened?
customer_reviews.author: CO88

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I can’t belive I am writing a negative review because these shoes have such amazing reviews and so many people are saying they are so uncomfortable. I have never ordered Clark’s shoes before, I usually buy Dr. Scholl’s but thought I would give Clark’s a try. I don’t know if I got a weird pair but they were not comfortable at all! They size fit perfectly but something about the mold of the shoe was uncomfortable which made walking very uncomfortable. Two stars for fast shipping and because the shoes themselves are very nice looking. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: A definite must buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable, I am a hairstylist I am on my feet sometimes after 12 hours a day and I can still walk by the end of the day. Always a good thing they fit great, I did go a half size up I wear between 9 1/2 and 10. I went up 1/2 size 10 because the 9 1/2 it but we’re a smidge tight. I love the shoes so much I ordered all the colors. Do not judge my photography skills, nor my worn out feet LOL it’s very hard to take pictures of yourself LOL
customer_reviews.author: leanne Hare

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Clark's sandals in this style and size, and I love them. These were a big dissappointment. They were smaller, the cut forced my heel to hang over the edge on the inside, and the padded soles were less comfortable. Also they are no longer made of leather. I'm returning them and won't buy this style again.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Cute, insanely comfy, all-day ready.  Instant favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Wife: Third pair of Clark's Annadel shoes! Also have them in Coral and Navy. Love these so much, they feel like slippers! First time I put them on I said "OMG, this is how shoes should feel!" I like them better than tennis shoes, and they're not so tall they're still super easy to walk in. Did 4 hours at the zoo the day I opened them and could have gone twice that they're so good. They're surprisingly warm, as there's lots of material. My feet got a little sweaty in Hawaii at first until I aclimated, but that just means I can wear them all year long in Seattle's mild winter! Don't wait....buy them now! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Harbin

customer_reviews.title: FELL ALMOST IMMEDIATELY! Experienced heel wearer!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to try Clark’s brand shoes. These were quite comfortable and very light in weight. However after wearing them for less than 15 minutes in my living room, the narrow wedge heel caused me to turn my ankle inward and fall to the ground twice! Rolled my ankle and swore never to put them on again. But I thought maybe it was just me. I tried again a few days later and the same thing happened. These shoes are not properly made to where my feet and legs are supported. Perhaps it is just my body. I just had higher hopes for this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Audra Englebright

customer_reviews.title: returned - what happened to sizing?
customer_reviews.text: Something happened to Clark's sizing. I exclusively wear Clarks shoes. They are awesome. I have high arches and wide feet and nothing fits my feet better than Clarks. I wear a 9.5W in Clarks close toed shoes and a 10 W in sandals. As I type this review, I'm wearing Womens Tulip Open Toe Casual Slingback Sandals in a 10W. I purchased these shoes in a 10W and can't even get them on my feet. Are these even real Clarks?
customer_reviews.author: NJ Yankee fan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Cute
customer_reviews.text: Just bought these wedge sandals and I was immediately disappointed by the color! The image of the sand color does not match perfectly with what I received, which was more of a taupe/almost light grey color. Some reviews say to order a size up. I am either a 5.5 or 6 so I went with a size 6. They fit perfectly and are ridiculously comfortable. The buckle sits right below my ankle bone, which could be bothersome and even painful, but for how light the shoes are, I don't think it'll be an issue. I'm keeping them and may consider purchasing the ones in black.
customer_reviews.author: Ash G

customer_reviews.title: and this one seems like it is made by another manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this is made by Clarks. I have had may types of Clarks sandals, and this one seems like it is made by another manufacturer. It looks like Clarks Caslynn sandals, but it is not the same. The material is cheap and is very uncomfortable. Usually Clarks sandals footbed are very comfortable and they have cushion plus technology and I can walk for hours comfortably with them. But this sandal is so uncomfortable and there is no cushion. Unfortunately I did not realize that they are so uncomfortable until I wore them and I can't return them. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: A Goli

customer_reviews.title: Run small.
customer_reviews.text: As usual, I end up having to order much larger than my actual size. My regular size is 6.5-7 in all shoes. In Clark’s, I need to order a size 8 in these. Don’t buy these unless you’ve work Clark’s before and know your size. That being said, these are so light and comfortable! I always tell my husband how comfortable Clark’s really are. They really rise above the average in terms of comfort and quality. Amazon still isn’t letting me post pictures, but as soon as they do I’ll make an effort to update the post.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable to walk in
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of the reviews for these Clark's shoes, and they all said how comfortable they are. Not so for me. I wore them to an outing to test run them. Walked maybe 1.5 hours and my feet were killing me. I had callouses on both of the outsides of my feet (my feet are narrow) and overall discomfort. I bought these in anticipation of an upcoming trip, but I will not even bother to pack them. Very disappointed - they were on the expensive side too. They're cute if you just want to wear them somewhere you will mostly be sitting, but if you need to stand or walk, I wouldn't reccomend them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lou

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Heel / Lacks Support
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed in this shoe. I love the style, and have another similar Clark pair that fit like a glove. For some reason the heel of this shoe is too narrow and my left foot kept hanging over the side, making it uncomfortable to walk. I was tempted to exchange for another size to see if it would make a difference, but after reading other reviews it appears I'm not alone in this. Really disappointing. I love Clark's.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamin of Paris

customer_reviews.title: Can wear the wide all day - even with bunions!
customer_reviews.text: Great-looking and I can wear most of the day VERY comfortably. I suffer from bunions - citation-sized bunions - and ordered a wide. Ordered my usual 9.5 and found it true to size. Navy color is great with so many outfits! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Making Happy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy..but size up!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the feel of these shoes. They're so comfortable to walk in and required no break in time. There is a cushion to the bottom and the leather straps on top feel soft to your foot. My only complaint is sizing. I normally wear an 8.5 regular width in most sandals. After reading reviews I sized up to 9 and went with wide width. I ended up having to exchange for 9.5W so a whole size bigger. That was a bit of a hassle but so worth it for the comfort. They're also a sturdy platform that doesn't cause the awkward ankle roll that some do.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe, especially if you have a large foot
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a size 10, but 10 was way too snug on me. 11 fit really well. It makes my foot look nice and not as large. I wish the strap had velcro on a larger area because it feels very lightly loose - nonetheless, It still fits nicely. As someone that doesn't wear that much heels, this is extremely comfortable and not that high. Thank goodness for wedges!
customer_reviews.author: Noaa Bujanover

customer_reviews.title: Love! Ordering more colors, had to size up
customer_reviews.text: Love these, had to size up, super comfortable and light. Ordering a pair in black and a pair blue. You won’t be sorry. I ordered my regular size had to return next day they make it so easy to return and refund was done same day as a gift card balance. They’re super cute and comfy. I have pain in my ankles with other heels and wedges but these I have zero pain.
customer_reviews.author: Carol D.

customer_reviews.title: 6 months in and they are still her favorite
customer_reviews.text: My love wears these all the time. She is a size 8.5 and that's what we got and they fit perfect. They are true to size. She wears them all the time and just said "If you ever decide to review something on Amazon, review these. They are great." I was debating between these and another cheaper pair to buy her and I'm really glad I went with these.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Soft leather
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, I can't not say enough good things about these shoes. I bought the first pair a couple of years back while on vacation. They were so comfortable that I went back to the store and bouht another pair. Months laterI was watching the Clark website and saw them again so I got set another. Now I had white, tan, and black. This color is a metallic but I don't care. I want the shoe and care not what color. I will be lookin for red and navy too. I have terribly hard to fit feet and these are more comfortable than my tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Bideford

customer_reviews.title: Can barely reach velcrow to attach
customer_reviews.text: Unless your legs are missing their ankles (mine are small), you will barely(if at all) be able to velcrow these to stay on. I have to pull it so tight to velcrow that they are then waaay to tight to be at all comfortable. So, they really hurt my feet and cant wear them. Sucks!! Otherwise I would probably wear them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lustig

customer_reviews.title: Softbed Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, softbed cushioning, and the velcro adjustable ankle strap. The suede is also soft and comfortable on the top of my foot. It felt tighter and a bit shorter than the other pair of Clarks I bought at the same time. Same size and height wedge with slightly different top in regular leather, and color. If you have a wide foot or big toes, this might pinch a bit, so order up or check for wide. After one wearing, I do think the suede stretched a bit, so I'm happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Beware on getting knockoffs
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered these in a size 7 after reading they are true to size. They were a bit too small - staps were too tight on the tops of my feet and my heels hung over the edge. I ordered a 7.5 next and they are the SAME size and look like knockoffs of the first pair. Different color soles, no breathable air holes, cheaper material. I just don't understand how I got 2 different quality shoes when I ordered from the exact same link.. I do really like the first pair I received even though they are a bit too small, I believe I can stretch out the leather straps on top to make them work.
customer_reviews.author: Hailee Carswell

customer_reviews.title: Your heel will hang off of the inner side of the shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Unless your foot is shaped like a “C”, your heel will always hang halfway off the inner side of the shoe. Terrible design, accident waiting to happen. I debated on taking this shoe to a shoe repair place, but they wanted to charge me another $30 to repair the shoe strap placement. Thats what causes it to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable shoes; probably one of the most comfortable shoes I now own. Definitely worth the money spent! I wore these all day at a county fair, etc. and I had no problems what so ever. They're true to size and great for my wide feet. The only problem I have with the shoe is that the velcro strap makes it hard to adjust as needed for the back of your heel. Despite that, these are an amazing pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: These are THE most comfortable shoe. With this height
customer_reviews.text: Holy Jumping Jacks! These are THE most comfortable shoe. With this height, it is difficult to find a comfortable shoe you can actually walk in without pain. This shoe proves to be the answer to all my poorass feet's needs. No, really, seriously folks. You won't be disappointed. But take note and order a size up. I normally wear an 8.5, I ordered a 9W. It is PERFECT! Getting ready to order another in a beige or black color.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. If the price seems too good to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I own many Clark’s shoes,this is the first 81/2 M that is too small for me. My normal size for an open toe is an 8M. Upon opening the box in was instantly clear that the packaging was not new. Actually, it wasn’t even pretending to be new, if you know what I mean. I suspect the sizing was altered. Very disappointed. If the price seems too good to be true...BEWARE!!! These are going back!!! I’ll get them from qvc or Zappo’s next time.
customer_reviews.author: murphyjo

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight, very comfortable shoes. Typically I do not care for wedge shoes, since they do not flex as you walk. However, the rocker sole on these provides just the right amount of forward movement to make walking easy and comfortable. In fact, I took a several mile walking city tour while wearing these - no foot or leg fatigue and no blisters! I have a high arch, and these support my arch completely. As noted in other reviews, they do run slightly small. I wear a solid 5.5. The size 6 I ordered is a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Buy a 1/2 size larger than your other Clarks
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are remarkably comfortable for the size of the heel. I own many pairs of clarks and I always buy a 6.5, but I had to return these for the size 7. The size 7 fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer in VA

customer_reviews.title: Do not wear if you have narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: So these wedges. Cute, right? So cute. And they seemed so comfy, until I left the house, walked a block, and then - let me tell you about clumsy people with weak ankles. There's this thing that happens when you take a step and all of a sudden your ankle is just...not there. Couple that with wedges that don't so much stay on the foot as sort of wobble around it like they're hoping to find some wider part to hold on to. The road rash from my tumble was somewhat spectacular. I don't wear these anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Go up one half size and you'll be fine
customer_reviews.text: Good lord these are perfect shoes. I took heed of the folks who said to size up half a size, especially since I have a wide foot and they only had Medium width. I chose the sand color to serve as a neutral that can be worn with several shades. Out of the box, they were a little snug in the width but the fabric is forgiving and my feet adjusted quickly. I've worn them for the last 5 hours straight and they feel like air. Sooooooo comfy and so flattering, too! Just wish they had a tan color. Def getting black now. Looking forward to going sightseeing in these pretty, pretty shoes that are as comfy as sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: joop

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable but SIZE UP
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a 9.5 but sometimes need a 10 depending on the shoe...I opted for a 10 in these shoes and they were still too small. I'm not sure if the 10 wide would have worked or not but I would say if you're in between sizes size up a full size. Other than that these shoes are a dream and are so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Classy in coral
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in coral, in 8 1/2 due to reviews here and elsewhere stating these run a bit small. I'd advise a half size up from your normal size. These wedges are fabulous in the under foot cushioning as well as pitch. I have fibromyalgia and metarsalgia and occasionally plantar fasciitis and I can wear these comfortably. The construction is excellent and the coral is a soft coral in nubuck leather. The heel offers a hook and loop closure or in other words a Velcro closure. There is nothing I'd change. Love the heel height and cork wrapped heel. Comfortable, easy elevation for not so great feet. What more could I ask for? Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Reviews 4 UTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Super good!
customer_reviews.text: Like having nothing in your feet! I own a pair of this ones in black, because they are so comfortable I got a pair of gold ones, but, the material in gold is a harder so it fit too narrow and I don't think it is going to stretch, I am exchanging them for a wider pair. other than that they are the best!
customer_reviews.author: ChristieS

customer_reviews.title: product does not have good support
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too trilled with the look of the product when I got it and I even started a return. When I was shopping around for a comfortable shoe since I have back problems, this shoe came out as one that could help me feel comfortable when walking. I decided to keep it and give it a try. I am very disappointed with the product because not only did it not help me but it's painful to walk on them. They do not have enough arch support so my ankle hurts. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Quality Wedge Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Clarks...what's not to love? White wedge sandal with cushiony feel when walking. I love that the heel portion is cork instead of white...the leather upper is reasonably soft, and the adjustable strap is perfect for when the leather stretches with wear. The bottoms are rubber, which gives the shoe a nice stability when walking. I normally wear a size 9, but ordered these in 9.5. The fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: In_my_opinion

customer_reviews.title: Love it. So comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I think investing in shoes are so important as I had a bunion surgery which was quite painful and I have been told by my doctor that my bunion can come back if I wear tight shoes that would supress my toes and I am trying to avoid that at all cost. So far happy with the product and it has a cushioning insole that minimizes your feet to get painful espcially when you have to be on your feet all day. I highly recommend Clarks shoes.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, but slides on the left shoe
customer_reviews.text: I got these today and they are incredibly comfortable. My only issue is when I walk just around my house in them my left foot slides to the side and I have to correct it. The strap is good, but the material on the left side is bulky from the other side. I’m not sure if I could have that fixed at shoe store, or send out for another pair. My nephew is graduating from Marine boot camp and I will need them soon and will be doing a lot of walking, I don’t want to keep correcting the shoe 😢😢
customer_reviews.author: Danno-lee

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I don't always need a wide, but ordered based on reviews and glad i did. The regular would have been too tight. I am not a shoe person by any means, but was shopping for comfortable shoes for a summer vacation and came across these. They are "like butter" - soft and smooth. Fit comfortably immediately out of the box. I know they will stretch a little which will be ok around the toes to give them a little breathing room, but no painful digging or pressure as they are right now.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Riggsby

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't sit straight on my feet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute and cushy, as you would expect with Clarks. What I didn't expect as someone with a LOT of size 8.5M Clarks is to have to size up to a 9 because they were so tight. Also, for some reason they kept forcing the heel of my foot to twist/slide to the inside (both 8.5 and 9) so my foot was no longer aligned with the footbed of the shoe. Felt very unstable walking so back they went.
customer_reviews.author: The Wild OliveTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: While these shoes are made beautifully, I did not like walking in them. The nubuck leather is very soft and comfortable, but the toe of the shoe curves upward, making walking feel strange. Returned due to that and I just wasn't a fan of the style on me personally.
customer_reviews.author: MghemmTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Never disappointed in Clarks. I wore these to work all day for the first time and they were so soft and comfortable. I love the velcro strap, you can find your perfect fit without looking for the hole! I just can't believe how great they fit and literally NO breaking them in! I could have walked all over town the first time I wore them. I had back surgery last year and haven't hardly worn heels since, these did not make my back hurt at all and are very easy to walk in. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Caputo

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable, even after a night on the town
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! I needed a nude, heeled sandal to wear with a classy dress that would be comfortable for 6 hours out on the town. These were amazingly comfortable--I hardly felt like I was wearing heels (or shoes, for that matter) at all! The wedge is solid and helped me stay on my feet, even after a few drinks. When I ordered, the 1/2 size up was out of stock and I needed them in a hurry, so I ordered my normal shoe/sandal size, which is 6.5. They fit just fine, no pinching or rubbing. I am already planning to order these in another color, I can see myself getting a lot of use out of them!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Herbst

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes ever made
customer_reviews.text: True to the Clarkes brand, these sandals are sooo comfy. However, they are also cute -- not something I always equate with Clarkes. I have worn them out and about all day, and for an entire wedding (on grass), with dancing all night, and my feet have never hurt! When on vacation, my feet ached after flip flops and longed for these sandals! The adjustable straps are nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Golly TM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the best wedges EVER!! I bought a pair several years ago and wear them ALL THE TIME during the summer months. They're getting a little worn looking, but still in great working order, so I wanted to make sure I had a back-up for years to come. I bought another pair for a spare for when these finally go. The new ones are just a little different from the original ones, but after trying them on, they feel the same (comfort-wise). I also own the same in tan. I am a shoe-a-holic and probably own 150 or more pair, but these are my go-to shoes. You will NOT go wrong in purchasing these!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I traditionally wear a size 8 and infrequently have to go up 1/2 a size due to fit. The Clark sandals I initially purchased were a size 8 but my toes and heels were hanging off. I returned my 1st order and went up 1/2 a size. My mistake, I should have gone up at least a full size. The 9 fits well and my mom ended up with the 8.5 (she typically wears a 7.5!) The shoes are cute and comfortable but run small.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer watley

customer_reviews.title: Not actually wide
customer_reviews.text: Yo I have like actual wide feet and was super excited about these because they're CUTE. But. Sadly. When I received them my foot wouldn't even slide into the shoe fully. I ordered the wide and was quite surprised since they appeared to be a regular width shoe. I had to return them due to this. However if you have normal feet and come across these they're super cute in person and would probably look good on you!!! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Liked the shoes; HOWEVER....
customer_reviews.text: I would order a size up. I ordered the size I wear and much too small. Returned them for a half size bigger; still too small and they looked like they had been worn. Got returned. I do love these shoes. Will be ordering another pair; a whole size larger than what I would normally wear. They are great shoes and seem like they would be comfy given the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: christie5683

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love these shoes. I wear them nearly every day now and they are so comfortable, plus I think they make every outfit I wear them with a little dressier. I wear them all day at work, and walked over a mile in them with no issues or blisters. I get compliments on them all the time. Just wish there was a similar pair in black leather (not nubuck/suede).
customer_reviews.author: J. Hawley

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute shoes and very comfortable. I walked the Vegas strip for several hours with no problem. I wear a size 6 wide and these fit perfect. Clark’s are Typically all the same in the size department. I wore with a tan and white dress and they looked great!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Domann

customer_reviews.title: Buy. These. Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Buy. These. Shoes. I have not been able to wear heels all day in 10 years. Turns out I was buying the wrong ones! These fit and support in all the right ways. I am now obsessed with Clark's and would be hard pressed to find something to match this comfort level. It did take me 10 years so I'm happy to stick with these! I was hesitant to pay this amount for something I figured would be as uncomfortable as the rest. What is that saying? You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Liss

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Warning: these are WIDE. I am a true 11M in all of my shoes but in some clarks I have to order the 11W. Well I ordered both sizes and the wides were the only ones that I could get on my foot. These are very wide. I loved the color and the easy closure in the back but I'm still trying to decide if I can keep them. The arch is also in the wrong place for me and I don't know how comfortable that will be.
customer_reviews.author: Cecily Bednarek

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews about the fit being small. In my case, the sole fit my foot but the leather is pretty tight. I do not have wide feet nor do I retain water in my feet, so the tightness is surprising. I will be getting them wet to stretch to my foot properly. The shoes are super light, have a perfect hight, and are very comfortable to walk on. Otherwise great and quality shoes for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sedenger

customer_reviews.title: Back, knee and foot approved!
customer_reviews.text: I had to size up in these because my toes were creeping over the edge. I have had a spinal fusion, bunionectomy on both feet and 5 knee surgeries. These shoes provide comfort and I never feel like I need to sit or kick them off due to pain. Finally, cute shoes that don't destroy me 15 minutes into wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: I wanted these to fit so badly
customer_reviews.text: I love the way they look, and was looking for a nude shoes to wear to a wedding, then i could wear them with anything, these were too small i have wide feet and couldnt not get them in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Christina U

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: too small for me, but a light weight sandal. And looked cute. I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful buy. Delivery was faster than just being on time and what’s even better is the quality of the shoes. So comfortable! I have very small feet and it took me years to finally find something that really fits my size. This is my first try here and now I’m going to buy more but different styles. I guess this site is going to be my major shoe source now :)
customer_reviews.author: chen yin

customer_reviews.title: Don't settle for imitation copycats!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfy sandles I have EVER worn!!!!! I've seen copycats under two different brand names for cheaper, but you get what you pay for (and these CLARKS are worth EVERY PENNY)! I wear a size 7.5 but ordered a size 8 due to reviews and I'm glad I did. They run 1/2 size small. So the 8s are perfect!! They feel as good first time on as a pair of slippers! No rubbing or blisters! These sandles are the bomb!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C.

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1/2 Size Bigger!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love these shoes BUT they do run small. A friend told me in advance or I would have ordered wrong. I am a true size 9. So I ordered a 9 1/2 and they fit perfectly with no room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Evava

customer_reviews.title: Throw out all of your sub-par wedges and sandals.
customer_reviews.text: In a word: Amazing. These shoes are like walking on clouds. The straps and soul just feel super plush and soft, no slipping no rubbing, and you really don't feel like you're walking in heels at all. See photos. I really think I'll need 3 more pairs. For note, I have size 10 feet with narrow to average width and they fit perfectly. There's an adjustable heel strap but I didn't need to use it. Worth the price. Perfect summer shoes for any occasion. I'm using these babies for a wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Moira M.

customer_reviews.title: Wide isn't wide
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because they were super cute and were suppose to be wide. Disappointed that they weren't wide like they should have been, but I gave them to my baby sister and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, classy sandal, Velcro fasten, slightly narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as part of “prime wardrobe”. The shoes are beautiful and have such a soft insole. (Clark’s are known for that.) I also liked the Velcro fasten....easier to take on and off. I typically wear between regular 8 - 8.5 depending on the shoe style. For me - the shoe seemed too narrow and I felt like my heel kept falling out of the sandal. Since I had the shoes in-hand, I ended up giving them to my mom. She typically wears 7.5 - 8, and they fit her perfectly. She’s very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Peach

customer_reviews.title: I love Clark’s Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Clark’s Shoes. I already own 5 pairs. I got these because they look cute and look like they’d be comfy to wear all day at work. My other Clark’s are size 9. I got these in a size 9. They are too small. Not just a little small, but my heel slightly hangs over the back and my toes are to the edge of the shoe in front. The shoe also feels a little snug. I advise if you’re going to get these, order 1 full size up.
customer_reviews.author: ARA

customer_reviews.title: Even the wide width sizes are narrow!
customer_reviews.text: They seem well made and the style is cute, but even the “Wide width” sizes are extremely narrow! I can usually get a regular size 10 on my feet, but they’re a little snug, so I opt for wide widths. I ordered these in a 10 wide, and I cannot even begin to get my feet into them!!! If you wear narrow width shoes, I recommend the regular sizes here. If you normally wear regular width, order the wide! If you normally wear wide width shoes, forget these and find a different sandal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile summer staple
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect summer staples. They're as comfortable as sneakers and versatile enough to wear with everything from jeans to dresses. The insole is padded and cushy. The cork is stylish. The Velcro straps make these a breeze to get in and out of, and the platform gives stability and a boost in height, without the feeling of wearing heels. Love these!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: True navy and great fit
customer_reviews.text: I have many pairs of Clarks. The Annadel Eirwyn model fits as well as the Caslynn that I bought a few years ago. THRILLED to find a true navy. While I wear only Clarks to work and am a total Clarks fangirl, I have to admit sometimes their colors are a little wonky. They call orange "red" more often than not. But these shoes are a beautiful navy, not purple and not royal blue. Clarks are the best for long narrow feet like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of the wonderful reviews. But to my disappointment , they are rather uncomfortable under the ball of the foot. I am keeping them as I was able to solve the problem with ball of foot silicone inserts. But they are not comfortable enough to do much walking in them . I will use them for times when I will not need to do much walking. They are an attractive summer dress sandal.
customer_reviews.author: weglice

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sandals recently for a trip I took to Paris. I wanted a comfy but stylish shoe I could walk around in. These shoes definitely fit the bill. I walked for miles in these, and they never cut into my heels or toes. The band around the back is adjustable velcro so you can make them as tight or loose around your ankles as you want. these were a bit of a splurge for me, but i'm so happy i decided to spend the money because they are WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best Teacher shoe EVER!!  Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, fellow teachers!! If you are like me and you don't want to say goodbye to all cute shoes or shoes that have any height to them in favor of the much needed comfort that we MUST HAVE, then have I got some shoes for you!!! Lightweight!! Versatile. Fashionable. And I only paid $49.99...Love these shoes! Velcro closure. Fit is true to size IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: FrugalSuperMommy

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair! Love them!
customer_reviews.text: loved the first pair so much..i ordered a 2nd pair to replace my worn out pair! I wore these all over Vegas a tourist shoes if that doesn't tell you how comfortable they are..
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe but buy 1/2 size larger
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes great quality as are all Clark's shoes but I wish I had listened to other buyers and bought a half size larger. Every pair of Clark's that I own is a size 7 but should have bought a 7-1/2 in these.
customer_reviews.author: Book Queen

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these (along with about 4 other pairs of different shoes) to try on for a Summer wedding. And I'm so glad I chose these to keep! One thing that helped with my decision to purchase was another buyer saying how comfortable they were and felt like they were walking on pillows. I totally agree!
customer_reviews.author: Shivonne D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and run small
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are feather light and very comfy! I usually wear a size 9 and my feet are on the wider side. I ordered these in 9.5W and they fit like a 9 regular, so I'm glad I ordered a half size bigger. I wouldn't describe these shoes as sexy but they're very comfy while still being cute, which is what this mom of 2 small kids needs!
customer_reviews.author: wedgita

customer_reviews.title: Hard to say no to these wedges.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so light and very comfortable. I have plantar fasciitis and have to be careful with shoe selection. I wore them for a little while on my tile floor and never felt the plantar fasciitis. It's a definite winner for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Walker

customer_reviews.title: Shoes gave me blisters that started only an hour after wearing!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear 9.5 in Clarks and I've never had an uncomfortable product from them until this one. The 9.5 was too short, I ordered a 10 but when I actually wore them on vacation the sides of my feet hurt and started blistering after an hour. Where the straps attach to the bed of the shoe seems way narrow and standing on that I think was the problem. These shoes are WAY overpriced and terribly designed. Really not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Electra

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have loved my other clark's platform style sandals. The suede-like light colored beige turned a dirty looking color quickly. The buckle has poor placement, rubbing against the ankle bone.
customer_reviews.author: lynette p.

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable but VERY tall!
customer_reviews.text: amazed at how perfectly these were designed & made. perfect walking shoe if you like heights. beautiful nude color. unfortunately, returning because I'm 2 months post-op for a knee replacement & the height of these I'm unable to wear safely. don't buy if you have weak ankles. do buy if you're looking for beautiful, comfortable platforms.
customer_reviews.author: j robin

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are SUPER cute and, because of the crisscross strap design, they fit my wide feet well. Not only are they stylish but they are also quite comfortable. The cork bottom gives just the right amount t of lift and has a nice, soft cushioned instep. I bought these in the sand color, which goes well with so many other colors and patterns I'll be able to wear them often. I would recommend these sandals, especially if you have a wider foot. I consider these a smart purchase and a bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: weird fit
customer_reviews.text: Weird fit and very uncomfortable foot bed, felt like I was walking on a block... not smooth like the insole looks. I thought size was off, so I tried a size up but hey were then too big, but still had the weird foot bed thing. I returned and bought a sister shoe from sketchers which I rated 5 Stars for comfort and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Didn't feel or fit like any Clarks I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I love Clarks and have worn many styles for many years. But these just didn't feel or fit like any Clarks I've owned. Leather coming loose from the sole, design/cut/irregular issue caused my foot to slide well inside (half my heal). And I walk on the outsides of my feet. A very bad fit. Fortunately, I was able to return them with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: B. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Order half size up!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, lightweight and comfortable, beautiful design and easy to wear! I should have listened to the other reviews, this shoe runs small. I ordered a size 9 and my foot goes to the tip of the front and back. I am planning on ordering a different color and I will definitely be getting a 9.5 or 10.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon B.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. I have 6 pairs of different kinds of shoes by Clark’s. However in this particular the sole came off after the second time wearing it. Too bad I couldn’t not return them since I waited after the 30 days to try them on. They r very attractive and versatile. But useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Brunilda Evangjello

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and never wear heels. After reading other reviews I took a chance on these. I love them. I am not a spring chicken and need stability in a wedge. These are not wobbly and light as a feather. I wore them to the theater one night and did quite a bit of walking - no complaints. Happy customer 😊
customer_reviews.author: haitilover

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy! Happy feet!!
customer_reviews.text: I so like this shoe! It is hard to find a cute white sandal, and equally hard to find a comfortable wedge for my sensitive high-arched feet. This shoe satisfied both of those things. The footbed actually “squishes” a bit as you walk - it has that much cushion to it. It’s a trendy young style and I found it super comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Momma McB

customer_reviews.title: Long wearing, comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and cute! They fit *just* right- I think a 1/2 size up would be too large, but as a sandal type shoe it works okay being bang on in sizing. Here's the most ringing endorsement I can give: wore these to a wedding and didn't need to change into flats or take these off all night, no problems walking with a couple glasses of wine on board, looked stylish enough to suit the occasion. Doesn't get much better!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are very comfortable and light weight and cute. Very easy to walk in. I'm glad I red the reviews because these shoes do run small. I'm normally a 7.5/8, but I ended up getting an 8.5w and they fit perfectly. I'm buying more in different colors now 👍
customer_reviews.author: melissa mcclure

customer_reviews.title: They are super comfy but did rub a bit of a blister ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Did go up half a size to a 9 as I wear between an 8 and a half and 9. They are super comfy but did rub a bit of a blister on the side/bottom of my foot but I did walk more in them then I probably should have. So far they are holding up well and it rained and they didn’t get discolored or fall apart. I am thinking of ordering a pair in Black they are just that comfortable. 4 stars because I just got them and have only worn them once.
customer_reviews.author: lovetoread

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but...
customer_reviews.text: Loved they style, seemed like they would be comfortable. But I am an 8W, and the wide seemed like a regular size. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: The smallest Clark's
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of Clark's. This wedge is beautiful but it ran SO small. I tried a 9 (tan) in store (my feet felt like they were on clouds) thinking 9.5 was going to be fine. I get the choral color and the only thing that was nice was the color. They were still way too small and they didn't feel like the normal Clark's cushion I had felt previously. I'm still a fan of Clark's but disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: So cute AND comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and comfy, arrived quickly and were packaged very well. I found mine to be true to size. I plan to order in more colors! No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Lildumplin

product_meta.title: Clarks Women's Annadel Eirwyn Wedge Sandal
product_meta.description: Your staple shoe for spring/summer! the front cross band elongates legs while the adjustable hook and look closure wraps the back of your foot. these are flattering sandals for everyone. these wedges have some platform built into the height and come with clarks comfort soft technology. so they are comfortable and beautiful
